package.name: trackingmore_detrack
package.summary: real-time track orders & cross-selling solution. Support tracking of UPS, FedEx, USPS & 380+ carriers.
package.description:
1.In site shipment real-time tracking and display all shipments in one place - UPS, DHL,USPS, Fedex & 100+ couriers (Free)
2.Notify customers when in transit, out for delivery, delivered or exceptions (Free)
3. Cross sale possibility on shipment tracking page (Free)

★ real-time track all shipments in one place .

1) Customers can have real-time access to In site track orders and shipments of their products
2) Display tracking data of one or multiple stores in one place
3) Auto detect the package Origin/Destination
4) Provides translation feature
5) Track 100+ Carriers for FREE!

★ Email notifications on shipment status change

Trackingmore will send out delivery notifications to customers or yourself. Your choice of notification triggers - In transit, Pick Up, Delivered, Expired or Exceptions. Use your own email to send out notifications, and customize messages to add store logo, URL, a direct tracking link to get more returned customers !

★ cross-selling solution

1) With our solution you can automate cross-selling while the package is on the way, automatically inform your customer with shipment delivery and increase your revenue.
2) By bringing the tracking process over to your own website, you can:
- Up/Cross sell add-ons to go with their recent purchase.
– Introduce them to new products.

Support Tracking of 100+ Couriers

• DHL • UPS • Fedex • TNT • China post • China EMS • Singapore Post • Singapore Speedpost • Hong Kong Post • Swiss Post • USPS • United Kingdom Royal Mail • Parcel Force • Netherlands Post - PostNL • Australia post • Australia EMS • Canada post • New Zealand Post • Belgium post • Brazil Correios • Russian Post • Sweden Posten • French Post -La Poste • France EMS - If you did not find the carrier you are using, email us service@trackingmore.com and we will take care of it.real-time track orders & cross-selling solution. Support tracking of UPS, FedEx, USPS & 380+ carriers.
